page.title: 01Profile of Acklington Area
page.content:
{Acklington}lies in the Alnwick District of Northumberlnd County.
The population of Acklington (including village, surrounding farms and Home Office houses) stands at 382.
Most of the working population are employed in agriculture or in one of the two local prisons.
Near to the village is an opencast coalmine and one mile east is a former coalmining village at{Broomhill.
The rural village of{Guyzance,}one mile north west, contributes pupils to Acklington First School.
Four miles away, the small town of {Amble}has schools for older children, shops, library and a health centre.
